item.description:
Will Davidson suggested we get together for a game night. I have room for several people at my house in Worcester, along with some board games and card games and video games.

If it's successful, we can make this a monthly thing.  It's been a couple years since we had a regular meeting of this group.

Feel free to bring a game, or food and drink to share.  I'll send my address to anyone who RSVPs "Yes".
item.how_to_find_us: I'll give an address and directions to anyone who RSVPs Yes
item.name: Game Night
